name: You Pilot A Piece Of S***: GAIDEN
name_original: You Pilot A Piece Of S***: GAIDEN
description:
On the surface, You Pilot A Piece Of S***: GAIDEN appears to be a simple two-button sidescrolling shoot 'em up with 10 playable characters, hilarious powerups and tons of action. Upon closer inspection however, one realizes that this is no mere game but instead a deeply metaphorical, spiritual and philosophical study of the human struggle as we navigate the often unpredictable and tempestuous waters of life.

One might ask: “Is it possible to confront the things that confront us? Is there no separation between well-being and space-time?” Perhaps, the answer to that may or may not lie within this "Game".

Journey on, Sweet Pilgrim, as you guide the brown chain through the crossroads of quantum turbulence!

KEY FEATURES:
- You get to control a piece of poop!
- It's REALLY cheap!
